trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Girard
There were no other sightings in Girard on or around August 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo fiery balls flown over the house tops. Neighbor saw the first one coming then we saw the second one coming shortly behind it. They both came from the south and headed to the north. Both had no sound. We lost sight of the objects as it continued north behind houses.
